Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by California in 1969...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1971, off Herm Starrette (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1971, off Chuck Nieson (MIN)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1971, hitting .287 with 8 HR, 69 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/26/1972, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 5/3/1973...
Injured on 8/17/1975 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1976, hitting .600 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cleveland on 7/16/1978...
Injured on 9/8/1981 with a Broken Ulna, out for 4 weeks...
